channel.title: Optimize OS - PURE NHING - MAIN HYBRIDING - LET'S PK GUYS
channel.description:
[center][u][b]Hello Guest![/b][/u]
Optimize-OS is a spawn PKing server with a little bit of PVMing in it, so if you are looking for a PKing server you should give our server a try, who knows maybe you like it :)!
[u]Links[/u] [url=http://www.optimize-os.com]Website[/url] [url=http://www.optimize-os.com/optimize-os.jar]Play Now ( direct download )[/url]
[u]Features[/u]
-Perfect Item switching -Very advanced combat system, balanced for each style. -Some OSRS items -Dicing system -Duel arena staking ( shortly ) -Full PvP World -Projectile clipping meaning you can hug objects while you NH hybrid, objects such as trees etc. -Great economy system for spawn servers.
[u]Media[/u] [video=youtube;EYDG55OB63M]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EYDG55OB63M[/video]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/nD8qgUu.png[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/ecede6249369a8f39238d15960f599fd.png[/img] [img]https://gyazo.com/9522af69a47c4d41635c23f3de2fc144.png[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/3c7268d50b51e69cf55588be8076614f.png[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/14c02fac4c3fc48cf5f52e5eb2f5bbc7.png[/img]
Note: We have currently no graphics so the thread may look poor, we will be getting some shortly and will update this thread by then.
C ya online![/center]

item.description:
@Muhamed1 wrote:

[center]Hello Guest!

Optimize-OS is a spawn PKing server with a little bit of PVMing in it, so if you are looking for a PKing server you should give our server a try, who knows maybe you like it :)!

Links
Website
Play Now ( direct download )

Features

-Perfect Item switching
-Very advanced combat system, balanced for each style.
-Some OSRS items
-Dicing system
-Duel arena staking ( shortly )
-Full PvP World
-Projectile clipping meaning you can hug objects while you NH hybrid, objects such as trees etc.
-Great economy system for spawn servers.
